title: Among Ash and Ember
description: Everything Katerina Nielsen knew burned to the ground when she was sixteen. She had nothing but memories to keep her warm at night. At eighteen, life throws her into an inferno and the only choice is to become someone else. Until she becomes the interest of two strangers.  They offer her a chance at a normal life. But she’s learned everything in life comes at a price and the cost of what they’re giving her may just burn her alive. With the promise of a future she’s always wanted, she can’t refuse. But what happens when a dark secret comes to light? Will she rise from the ashes and embers, or will she burn?
author: Dani René
